FORMULA_TEXT:
/*************************************************************************************************
  FORMULA NAME: BKD_Recruit_Candidate_Selection_DRA_FF
  FORMULA TYPE: Recruiting Candidate Selection Process
  DESCRIPTION: Conditions can be used to determine if an automated action must be executed or to prevent moving a job application
  Change History:
  Name                      Date               Comments
 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fox               03/05/2020         Initial Version
********************************************************************************************************/

 
/*=========== INPUT VALUES DEFAULTS ENDS======================*/
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE IS 'N/A'
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_STATUS_CODE IS 'N/A'
CONDITION_RESULT = 'N'


index =  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.FIRST(-1) 
L_TOT_COUNT = IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.COUNT 

/* Looping through the Request Info Array.  Not sure why this is an array type but it is.  If it finds any that meet requirements then this returns true */
WHILE (  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.EXISTS(index)) 
LOOP (
 /*  IF start date of assignment < enrollment END date and status code != ACTIVE DUTY then need to use start date as the end value  */
 l_code = IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE[index]
 l_status = IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_STATUS_CODE[index]
 /* Using only Appflow Code and Status code of submitted.  Could use version but dont think it is needed here */
 if(l_code = 'BKD_DRA_APPROVAL' AND l_status = 'ORA_SUBMITTED') THEN
 (
  CONDITION_RESULT = 'Y'
 )
 index =  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.NEXT(index, -1) 
)

  

return  CONDITION_RESULT
Description: Automatically progress a candidate from one state to the next within the candidate selection process, following completion of the DRA Request pass application.

FORMULA_TEXT:
/*************************************************************************************************
  FORMULA NAME: BKD_Recruit_Candidate_Selection_FIRSTPASS_FF
  FORMULA TYPE: Recruiting Candidate Selection Process
  DESCRIPTION: Conditions can be used to determine if an automated action must be executed or to prevent moving a job application
  Change History:
  Name                      Date               Comments
 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fox               03/05/2020         Initial Version
********************************************************************************************************/

 
/*=========== INPUT VALUES DEFAULTS ENDS======================*/
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE IS 'N/A'
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_STATUS_CODE IS 'N/A'
CONDITION_RESULT = 'N'


index =  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.FIRST(-1) 
L_TOT_COUNT = IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.COUNT 

/* Looping through the Request Info Array.  Not sure why this is an array type but it is.  If it finds any that meet requirements then this returns true */
WHILE (  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.EXISTS(index)) 
LOOP (
 /*  IF start date of assignment < enrollment END date and status code != ACTIVE DUTY then need to use start date as the end value  */
 l_code = IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE[index]
 l_status = IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_STATUS_CODE[index]
 /* Using only Appflow Code and Status code of submitted.  Could use version but dont think it is needed here */
 if(l_code = 'BKD_FIRSTPASS_ADDITIONAL_INFO' AND l_status = 'ORA_SUBMITTED') THEN
 (
  CONDITION_RESULT = 'Y'
 )
 index =  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.NEXT(index, -1) 
)

  

return  CONDITION_RESULT
Description: Automatically progress a candidate from one state to the next within the candidate selection process, following completion of the 1st pass application.

FORMULA_TEXT:
/*************************************************************************************************
  FORMULA NAME: BKD_Recruit_Candidate_Selection_SecondPass_FF
  FORMULA TYPE: Recruiting Candidate Selection Process
  DESCRIPTION: Conditions can be used to determine if an automated action must be executed or to prevent moving a job application
  Change History:
  Name                      Date               Comments
 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fox               03/05/2020         Initial Version
********************************************************************************************************/

 
/*=========== INPUT VALUES DEFAULTS ENDS======================*/
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE IS 'N/A'
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_STATUS_CODE IS 'N/A'
CONDITION_RESULT = 'N'


index =  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.FIRST(-1) 
L_TOT_COUNT = IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.COUNT 

/* Looping through the Request Info Array.  Not sure why this is an array type but it is.  If it finds any that meet requirements then this returns true */
WHILE (  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.EXISTS(index)) 
LOOP (
 /*  IF start date of assignment < enrollment END date and status code != ACTIVE DUTY then need to use start date as the end value  */
 l_code = IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE[index]
 l_status = IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_STATUS_CODE[index]
 /* Using only Appflow Code and Status code of submitted.  Could use version but dont think it is needed here */
 if(l_code = 'BKD_SECONDPASS_ADDITIONAL_INFO' AND l_status = 'ORA_SUBMITTED') THEN
 (
  CONDITION_RESULT = 'Y'
 )
 index =  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE.NEXT(index, -1) 
)

  

return  CONDITION_RESULT
Description: Automatically progress a candidate from one state to the next within the candidate selection process, following completion of the 2nd pass application.

FORMULA_TEXT:
/*************************************************************************************************
  FORMULA NAME: BKD_Recruit_CSP_Rehire_Ineligible_FF
  FORMULA TYPE: Recruiting Candidate Selection Process
  DESCRIPTION: Conditions can be used to determine if an automated action must be executed or to prevent moving a job application
  Change History:
  Name                      Date               Comments
 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fox               12/01/2023         Initial Version
********************************************************************************************************/

 
/*=========== INPUT VALUES DEFAULTS ENDS======================*/
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_APPFLOW_CODE IS 'N/A'
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR  IRC_CSP_REQUEST_INFO_STATUS_CODE IS 'N/A'
CONDITION_RESULT = 'N'
l_submission_id = GET_CONTEXT(SUBMISSION_ID,0)
L_STATUS = add_rlog (-1 , -1 , 'RRACHAMADUGU - Sub ID:'|| TO_CHAR(l_submission_id))
l_rehire_eligible = 'Y'

l_param = '|=P_SUBMISSION_ID='||to_char(l_submission_id)
l_rehire_eligible = GET_VALUE_SET('BKD_ORC_CHK_REHIRE_ELIGIBILITY',l_param )

 if IS_TEXT_NULL(l_rehire_eligible) = 'N' then
        l_rehire_eligible = 'Y'
		
L_STATUS = add_rlog (-1 , -1 , 'RRACHAMADUGU - Rehire Flag: '|| l_rehire_eligible)

if l_rehire_eligible = 'Y' THEN
CONDITION_RESULT = 'N'

if l_rehire_eligible = 'N' THEN
CONDITION_RESULT = 'Y'

L_STATUS = add_rlog (-1 , -1 , 'RRACHAMADUGU - Condition Res: '|| CONDITION_RESULT)

return  CONDITION_RESULT
Description: Automatically progress a candidate from one state to the next within the candidate selection process, following completion of the 2nd pass application and it compares the Rehired candidate's SS# and their Legal Use Only field = 'Yes' OR Term Reason is a value that disqualifies the candidate for rehire.

FORMULA_TEXT:
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR IRC_CSP_INTRVWRQST_STATUS IS 'NA'
CONDITION_RESULT = 'N'
CONDITION_MESSAGE = 'Debug: '

i = 1
WHILE IRC_CSP_INTRVWRQST_STATUS.EXISTS(i) LOOP
(
 CONDITION_MESSAGE = CONDITION_MESSAGE || IRC_CSP_INTRVWRQST_STATUS[i]

 IF IRC_CSP_INTRVWRQST_STATUS[i] = 'INTERVIEW_SCHEDULED' THEN
   CONDITION_RESULT = 'Y'

 i = i + 1
)

RETURN CONDITION_RESULT, CONDITION_MESSAGE
Description: Automatically progress a candidate from one state to the next within the candidate selectin process, following scheduling of their interview.

FORMULA_TEXT:
DEFAULT FOR IRC_CSP_JOBAPP_INTERNAL IS 'N'
CONDITION_RESULT = 'N'
...
RESULT = IRC_CSP_JOBAPP_INTERNAL

IF (RESULT = 'N' THEN
CONDITION_RESULT = 'Y'

return CONDITION_RESULT
Description: a fast formula to determine if a candidate is external.

FORMULA_TEXT:
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR IRC_CSP_ASSMNT_PARTNER_NAME IS 'N/A'
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR IRC_CSP_ASSMNT_PACKAGE_CODE IS 'N/A'
DEFAULT_DATA_VALUE FOR IRC_CSP_ASSMNT_PACKAGE_NAME IS 'N/A'
CONDITION_RESULT = 'Y'

i = 1
WHILE IRC_CSP_ASSMNT+PARTNER+NAME.EXISTS(i) LOOP
(
    partner_name = IRC_CSP_ASSMNT_PARTNER_NAME[i]
    package_status_code = IRC_CSP_ASSMNT_PACKAGE_CODE[i]

    /* ORA_INITIATED, ORA_REQUESTED, ORA_COMPLETED_PASS, ORA_COMPLETED_FAIL */
    IF package_status_code != 'ORA_REQUESTED' THEN
    CONDITION_RESULT = 'N'

    i = i + 1
)
return CONDITION_RESULT
Description: a fast formula based on assessment result.

FORMULA_TEXT:
CONDITION_RESULT = 'N'
CONDITION_MESSAGE = 'Debug: '
 
l_interview_operation  = get_context(IRC_INTRVW_OPERATION, 'UNDEFINED')
 
CONDITION_MESSAGE = CONDITION_MESSAGE || l_interview_operation 
  
IF(l_interview_operation = 'INTERVIEW_COMPLETED') THEN
  CONDITION_RESULT = 'Y'
  
return CONDITION_RESULT, CONDITION_MESSAGE
Description: a fast formula based on a candidate interview being completed.
